summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; authorizing an agreement with the City of Kent permitting the City of Seattle to construct, reconstruct, operate and maintain a sewer pipeline to convey leachate from the Kent Highlands Sanitary Landfill Site through certain street rights of way in the City of Kent to the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle's West Valley Sanitary Interceptor Sewer System at S. 228th St. and W. Valley Road.
